response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal projects. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $12,000. This price reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the potential benefits it can bring to you. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about how it can meet your specific needs.", "product_price": 12000}
